amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds provided by this Act from closing campgrounds operated by the Army Corps of Engineers that are located at Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
